subject: Baseball
Basketball
Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Retroactive rooting allows for hindsight in backing teams and athletes, a device that allows any fan to be, years later, on the side of righteousness, if not victory.
snippet: Retroactive rooting allows for hindsight in backing teams and athletes, a device that allows any fan to be, years later, on the side of righteousness, if not victory.
